Year of the Trees 1125: Eressëa]] to the [[Bay of Balar]]. Ulmo summons the [[Elves]] to embark on the isle and leave for [[Aman]]; only the [[Vanyar]] and the [[Noldor]] hear the summons and they leave [[Middle-earth]] without the [[Teleri]].<ref name="Annals">{{AA

{{ardayearheader: * Part of the island breaks off and remains in the Bay, becoming the [[Isle of Balar]].<ref>{{S
* The [[Teleri]], in the east of [[Beleriand]], search for their lord [[Thingol
Year of the Trees 1125: Elwë]]. Unsuccessful - and discovering that [[Ingwë]] and [[Finwë]] had already departed - they make Elwë's brother [[Olwë]] their lord. They push onto the shores and are befriended by [[Ossë]] and [[Uinen]] and become lovers of the seas.<ref name="Annals" />
